name: NHSN_CLIP_ABSTNS
description: The NHSN_CLIP_ABSTNS table contains information from Central Line Insertion Practices abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the CLIP event.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the associated patient record for the CLIP event.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The current status category ID of the CLIP event.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_USER_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the user who set the current abstraction status for the CLIP event.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the current abstraction status was set for the CLIP event.

columns.name: CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the CLIP event was created.

columns.name: NHSN_INSERTION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the central line was inserted for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_RECORDER_C_NAME
columns.description: The recorder category ID for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_INSRTR_EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the employee who inserted the central line for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_INSRTR_EMP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: NHSN_INSERTER_JOB_C_NAME
columns.description: The occupation category ID of the central line inserter for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the central line inserter was a member of the PICC/IV team.

columns.name: NHSN_INSRTN_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason category ID for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_GUIDEWIRE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the central line was exchanged over a guidewire for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_INSRTN_RSN_C has a value of 3 - Suspected central line-associated infection.

columns.name: NHSN_HAND_HYGIENE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether hand hygiene was performed prior to the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_WORE_MASK_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a sterile mask was worn for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_WORE_GOWN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a sterile gown was worn for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_USED_DRAPE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a sterile drape was used for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_WORE_GLOVES_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether sterile gloves were worn for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_WORE_CAP_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a sterile cap was worn for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_CHG_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether chlorhexidine gluconate was used as a skin prep agent for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_IODINE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether povidone iodine was used as a skin prep agent for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_ALCOHOL_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether alcohol was used as a skin prep agent for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_OTHER_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether any other agent (aside from chlorhexidine gluconate, povidone iodine, or alcohol) was used as a skin prep agent for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_CHG_CONTRAIND_C_NAME
columns.description: The CHG contraindication category ID for the central line insertion for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_PREP_CHG_YN has a value of N.

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_DRY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the skin prep agent used was dry at the time of central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_INSRTN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: The insertion site category ID for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_COATED_CATH_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether an antimicrobial coated catheter was used for this central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_CL_CATH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The catheter type category ID for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_CL_SUCCESS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the central line insertion was successful for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_OTHER_JOB
columns.description: The occupation of the person inserting a central line for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_INSERTER_JOB_C has a value of 10 - Other.

columns.name: NHSN_OTHER_RSN
columns.description: The reason for a central line for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_INSRTN_RSN_C has a value of 4 - Other.

columns.name: NHSN_OTHER_PREP
columns.description: The skin prep agent used for a central line for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_PREP_OTHER_YN has a value of Y.

columns.name: NHSN_OTHER_CL_TYPE
columns.description: The catheter type used during a central line insertion for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_CL_CATH_TYPE_C has a value of 7 - Other.

columns.name: NHSN_CHG_AGE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was less than 2 months old when the central line was inserted for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_CHG_CONTRAIND_C has a value of 1 - Yes.

columns.name: NHSN_CHG_ALLERGY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has an allergy to chlorhexidine gluconate for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_CHG_CONTRAIND_C has a value of 1 - Yes.

columns.name: NHSN_CHG_SAFETY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether facility restrictions or safety concerns for chlorhexidine gluconate use in premature infants precludes its use for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_CHG_CONTRAIND_C has a value of 1 - Yes.

columns.name: ASSOCIATED_LOC_NHSN_DEF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the NHSN Location (CMU record) associated with the CLIP event.
